revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=RP-AC52 |revision=A1 |series=AC750 |asin=B00JDHNJEA;US;,B00K19S3UO;GB; |manuf_country=China |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |fcc_date=05/29/2015 |fcc_id=MSQ-RPAC52 |ic_id=3568A-RPAC52 |type=repeater, range extender, audio streamer |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.25 |pwr_conn=NEMA 1-15P |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7620A |cpu1_cspeed=580 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=SPI |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6KB-25 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7620A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7610E |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains=1 |wi2_rxchains=1 |wi2_sstreams=1 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=Audio DAC chip;Realtek;ALC5629;;1; |flags=Audio out (3.5mm) |tp_firmware=Padavan ? |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=E0:3F:49 |oui_eth=E0:3F:49 }} {{TagLine|Wireless-AC750 Dual-Band Range Extender}} :[https://www.asus.com/Networking/RPAC52/ Product page]
This device supports audio streaming.. this function is controllable :with the ''ASUS AiPlayer'' app ([https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dlna.asus2 on Android]). Default settings (including the SSIDs) are per the FCC sample label and manual.
===Overview=== * 802.11ac concurrent dual-band wireless range extender * 2.4GHz and 5GHz signal strength indicators * Streaming music with ASUS AiPlayer app and multiple :wireless streaming protocols * One-touch setup and hassle-free connectivity * Extended coverage with powerful internal antennas
===Specifications=== *Product Segment: 802.11abgn/ac (AC750) :300Mbps (2.4GHz) + 433Mbps (5GHz) *Antenna: 2x internal PCB antenna *Ports: 1x RJ45 for 10/100 BaseT for WAN *Power Supply: :AC Input : 110~240V (50~60Hz) :DC Output : 5V with max 1.2A current *Dimensions: 54 x 31 x 85 mm (WxDxH) *Weight: 90 g
===Reviews=== *[http://www.ixbt.com/comm/asus-rp-ac52.shtml On '''iXBT'''] *[http://www.kitguru.net/networking/henry-butt/asus-rp-ac52-dual-band-wireless-ac750-range-extender-review/ On '''KitGuru'''] *[http://www.7tutorials.com/reviewing-asus-rp-ac52-range-extender-80211ac-wifi-networks On '''7Tutorials'''] *[https://openitforum.pl/index/recenzje/network/apoints/asus-rp-ac52-dwupasmowy-extender-ac750-r241/ On '''Openitforum'''] *[http://www.foxnetwork.ru/index.php/ru/component/content/article/196-asus-rp-ac52.html On '''FoxNetwork'''] :SoC: [[MediaTek]] MT7620A @580MHz (2T2R 802.11bgn) :WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7610EN (1T1R 802.11an/ac) :RAM: Winbond W9751G6KB-25 64MB (DDR2) :Audio: Realtek ALC5629 (DAC)
===Forum threads=== *[http://forums.hardwarezone.com.sg/internet-bandwidth-networking-clinic-4/%5Bmaylyns-review-~-networking%5D-asus-rp-n53-4290051.html Maylyn's Review ~ HWZ] *[http://forums.smallnetbuilder.com/showthread.php?t=11810 On '''SmallNetBuilder''']
===Misc=== *[http://www.likelyanswers.com/6778055/Mediatek-First-To-Bring-80211ac-1t1r-dual-Band-Concurrent-Home-Networks MediaTek press release]
===See also=== :;[[ASUS RP series]] *[[ASUS RP-AC87]] - ''Wireless-AC2600 Dual Band Repeater'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RP-AC87/ PPage] *[[ASUS RP-AC68U]] - ''Wireless-AC1900 Dual Band Repeater'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RP-AC68U/ PPage] *[[ASUS RP-AC66]] - ''Wireless-AC1750 Dual Band Repeater'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RP-AC66 PPage] *[[ASUS RP-AC56]] - ''Wireless-AC1200 Dual Band Repeater'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RP-AC56/ PPage] *[[ASUS RP-AC55]] - ''Wireless-AC1200 Dual Band Repeater'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RP-AC55/ PPage] *[[ASUS RP-AC53]] - ''AC750 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Repeater'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RP-AC53/ PPage] *[[ASUS RP-AC52]] - ''AC750 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Repeater/AP'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RPAC52/ PPage] *[[ASUS RP-AC51]] - ''AC750 Wall-Plug Wi-Fi Range Extender'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RP-AC51/ PPage]
